content: Ticketing system analysis complete. Found: 1) GitHub Issues (16 open, 1 closed) - primary platform, 2) AI-Trackdown CLI v1.1.9 available, 3) Local tasks directory with 123 issues, 4) One in-progress issue ISS-0070 (Vercel stakeholder role selection), 5) Critical deployment issues ISS-0114 and ISS-0115 require immediate attention, 6) AI-Trackdown CLI has parsing failures for some files lacking YAML frontmatter
